learning_outcomes.description: Review literature and design a research project using MRI.
Collect, analyse and organise information and convey that information clearly and fluently.
Analyse results, create reports and discuss findings.
Make recommendations and improvements to the field.

assessments.task_description: Project proposal must include aims, justification, methods, equipment and bibliography.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Students are permitted to submit a draft prior to final submission. Please submit your dissertation to TurnItIn, through BlackBoard (https://learn.uq.edu.au ). Detailed instructions on how to access and use TurnItIn will be provided at the beginning of the semester. The assignment should be saved as a word or a pdf file. The file name should be MRES7018_surname_def.doc. The first page of your assignment must be the assignment coversheet filled with your details. The coversheet is available for downloading on Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: Powerpoint presentation of the project. This should be presented to a group of your peers.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Students are permitted to submit a draft prior to final submission. The PowerPoint presentation should be submitted via Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Submit an absolute maximum of 15000 words. Should follow standard format:

  • Introduction, which concludes with aim and hypothesis
  • Literature review
  • Methods
  • Results
  • Discussion and Imaging Portfolio
  • Conclusion
  • Bibliography
assessments.submission_guidelines: Students are permitted to submit a draft prior to final submission. Please submit your dissertation to TurnItIn, through BlackBoard (https://learn.uq.edu.au ). Detailed instructions on how to access and use TurnItIn will be provided at the beginning of the semester. The dissertation should be saved as a word or a pdf file. The file name should be MRES7018_surname_dis.doc. The first page of your assignment must be the assignment coversheet filled with your details. The coversheet is available for downloading on Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
